content: an easy and quick project suitable for beginners the beret is knitted in the round with stockinette stitch from the bottom to the top it has a rolled up edge in the bottom and an i-cord stem on top the name for the beret is from the t-shirt i was wearing when i took the project photos of the first beret for ravelry i thought the name suited the beret since it s quite classical take on the hat that has become the icon of everything french happy knitting
